text: in a small community in the pacific northwest a dynamic company is growing this company has served the equipment dealer market for 30 years they did it by following their principles by being the up their mind until it's sitting there and they put on 10 15 hours on it and realize you know what maybe i can do this money happens to be there or sometimes you might not realize that sale right away it might be a year down the road but if the seed is planted that's all you can hope for is that it will grow and it'll get you something to come back with because that growth for us yeah is exceptional and do we do we know if we'll ever have another year like it you know we sure hope we do it we hope we can improve on that but at the same time we're we're optimists but we're we're still be honest with everybody the main thing about the growth that's a great great number what have you we measure our growth with customer satisfaction the customers are happy tell your neighbor if you're
